name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I specialize in deploying and managing cloud solutions leveraging **Microsoft Azure**, **IaaS**, and **Azure DevOps** for robust infrastructure automation. My skill set includes expertise in **PowerShell**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible** to streamline processes and enhance operational efficiency. I am proficient in establishing CI/CD pipelines to ensure smooth deployment and delivery of applications.
Alongside my cloud engineering capabilities, I bring a solid background in full-stack development, where I utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to create high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My experience encompasses utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django** to build secure applications aligned with compliance standards including HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for advanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
